00047 GContainer *
00048 luau_net_queryServer(const AProgInfo *info, GError **err) {
00049         GContainer *updates;
00050         GString *contents, *temp;
00051         int len;
00052         
00053         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, NULL);
00054         
00055         if (info->url == NULL) {
00056                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_NET_ERROR, LUAU_NET_ERROR_INVALID_ARG, "Can't check for updates: no URL specified");
00057                 return NULL;
00058         }
00059         contents = lutil_ftp_getURL(info->url, err);
00060         if (contents == NULL) {
00061                 g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00062                 return NULL;
00063         }
00064         
00065         len = strlen(info->url);
00066         if (len > 3 && lutil_streq(info->url+len-3, ".gz")) {
00067                 DBUGOUT("Updates file is compressed: uncompressing");
00068                 temp = lutil_uncompress(contents, err);
00069                 g_string_free(contents, TRUE);
00070                 if (temp == NULL) {
00071                         g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00072                         return NULL;
00073                 }
00074                 contents = temp;
00075         }
00076         
00077         updates = luau_parseXML_updates(contents->str, err);
00078         g_string_free(contents, TRUE);
00079         
00080         if (updates == NULL) {
00081                 g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00082                 return NULL;
00083         }
00084         
00085         return updates;
00086 }
00087 
00098 gboolean
00099 luau_net_downloadUpdate(const AProgInfo* info, const AUpdate *update, APkgType pkgType, const char* downloadTo, GError **err) {
00100         char md5[33], *loc;
00101         APackage *package;
00102         gboolean loopAgain, result;
00103         int choice;
00104         
00105         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00106         
00107         md5[0] = '\0';
00108         
00109         package = luau_getUpdatePackage(update, pkgType, err);
00110         
00111         if (package == NULL) {
00112                 g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00113                 return FALSE;
00114         } else if (package->mirrors == NULL || package->mirrors->len == 0) {
00115                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_NET_ERROR, LUAU_NET_ERROR_INVALID_ARG, "Couldn't find filename of specified type for this update");
00116                 return FALSE;
00117         }
00118         
00119         loc = luau_getPackageURL(package, err);
00120         if (loc == NULL) {
00121                 g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00122                 return FALSE;
00123         }
00124         
00125         result = lutil_ftp_downloadToFile(loc, downloadTo, err);
00126         if (result == FALSE) {
00127                 g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00128                 return FALSE;
00129         }
00130         
00131         if (package->md5sum[0] != '\0') {
00132                 lutil_md5_file(downloadTo, md5, err);
00133                 if (md5[0] == '\0') {
00134                         g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00135                         return FALSE;
00136                 }
00137                 
00138                 result = FALSE;
00139                 if (! lutil_streq(md5, package->md5sum)) {
00140                         while (1) {
00141                                 loopAgain = FALSE;
00142                                 choice = lutil_error_prompt("MD5 Sum Mismatch", "The computed md5 sum of the downloaded file does not match the expected value", 3, 2, "Re-Download", "Use Anyway", "Cancel");
00143                                 switch (choice) {
00144                                         case 0: /* Re-Download */
00145                                                 unlink(downloadTo);
00146                                                 result = luau_net_downloadUpdate(info, update, pkgType, downloadTo, err);
00147                                                 if (result == FALSE) {
00148                                                         g_assert(err == NULL || *err != NULL);
00149                                                         return FALSE;
00150                                                 }
00151                                                 break;
00152                                         case 1: /* Use Anyway */
00153                                                 result = TRUE;
00154                                                 break;
00155                                         case 2: /* Cancel */
00156                                                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_NET_ERROR, LUAU_NET_ERROR_ABORTED, "MD5 sum mismatch (found %s, expected %s): aborted", md5, package->md5sum);
00157                                                 result = FALSE;
00158                                                 unlink(downloadTo);
00159                                                 break;
00160                                         default:
00161                                                 loopAgain = TRUE;
00162                                 }
00163                                 
00164                                 if (!loopAgain)
00165                                         break;
00166                         }
00167                 } else {
00168                         /* MD5 matched expected */
00169                         result = TRUE;
00170                 }
00171         } else {
00172                 /* MD5 not checked because none given */
00173                 result = TRUE;
00174         }
00175         
00176         return result;
00177 }
